Name: Into the Shell
Description: Discard a card from your hand. If you do, skip the Enemies Attack step of the next night.

Name: Submerge
Description:
Gain 2 vitality.
Draw an action or resource on the field.

Name: Dabble
Description:
Draw a card.
Deal 2 damage.
Remove 3 time counters.
Gain 4 vitality.
